name: A Little Car
description:
Do you know how it feels like to dominate? Enjoy the thrill of dominating your opponents in the one and only A Little Car!

Racing has never been so fun! Go to the garage and pimp your ride with endless possibilities. Start the engine and challenge chiefs at each block to win your reputation. Don't wait, start climbing the ladder now and become #1!

Features
◆ Fully compatible with iPhone4, iPhone5, iPad and the New iPad.
◆ Cute little car sure has its personality, but don't let its size fool you!
◆ Make yourself an unique looking car with tons of customization options.
◆ Different challenges like Freedom Block, Elimination Leagues, Regional Leaders and King of Race Car will keep you forever entertained.

How to play
◆ First off, purchase a cute car. The best racer always needs the right car.
◆ Get on the road and enter a challenge. Begin with an easy race - you will eventually beat everyone out there!
◆ Performing a Perfect Start will leave your opponents with absolutely no chance of catching up!
◆ Press the Nitrogen button to catch up with your opponents or increase your lead!
◆ Don't forget to upgrade your ride. The added power will pave the way for you to become the King of Race Car!
